did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, speeches, reports, subject files, and other papers.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, speeches, reports, subject files, and other papers of Dullea, chiefly during his Directorship of State Operations and Policy Management; includes personal correspondence and files relating to Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, speeches, reports, subject files, and other papers of Dullea, chiefly during his Directorship of State Operations and Policy Management; includes personal correspondence and files relating to Cornell University. Also, a set of indexed transcripts from the six public hearings of the Temporary State Commission on Constitutional Revision, 1994, and information on the Lake Course Cooling Project and Graduate Student unionization at Cornell (2002).

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York (State). State Operations and Policy Management.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Henrik N. Dullea papers, #4-1-2981. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

These folders all pertain to Mario Cuomo's 1987 trip to the (former) Soviet Union. They contain various information, correspondences and articles from before, during and after the trip.
